data.name: RPG Sounds - Midnight Curse - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Midnight Curse is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Drumming Meditation
  • March Into The Mist
  • Tales From The Past

Ambience
  • Agitated Magic Forest

SFX
  • Animate Trees (4)
  • Call Nature (4)
  • Treant Collapse (4)
  • Dig Roots (4)
  • Treant Hurt (4)
  • Treant Roar (4)
  • Treant Slam Hit (4)
  • Treant Slam Miss (4)
  • Treant Step (4)

data.short_description: Ancient Woodlands is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
